original_text: People today are like those children. John the Baptist did not eat ordinary food. He never drank wine. So people say that he has a bad spirit in him.
korean_text: 요한이 와서 먹지도 않고 마시지도 아니하매 그들이 말하기를 귀신이 들렸다 하더니

sentences.original_text: People today are like those children
John the Baptist did not eat ordinary food
sentences.korean_translation: 세례 요한은 일반적인 음식을 먹지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: So people say that he has a bad spirit in him
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사람들은 그의 안에 나쁜 영이 있다고 말합니다
